remark on romberg quadratur a modifi form of romberg quadraturis describ which is less sensit to the accumul ofround error than the customari on cacm april 1965 krasuna m prager w ca650418 jb march 7 1978 327 pm 1273 5 1273 1273 5 1273 1273 51273 1352 5 1273 1982 5 1273 2040 5 12731 6 1273 834 6 1273 872 6 1273 10406 1273 1092 6 1273 1241 6 1273 1241 61273 1273 6 1273 1273 6 1273 1273 6 12731352 6 1273 1356 6 1273 1883 6 1273 3246 1273 324 6 1273 324 6 1273 429 61273 570 6 1273 621 6 1273 621 6 1273786 6 1273
